analysis.description:
TitsToken.sendToBeneficiaryContract (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#392-397) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- beneficiaryContract.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#393-394)

ERC20Basic (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#72-80) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#75)

ERC20 (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#83-93) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#87-88)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#88-90)

BasicToken (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#98-127) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#106-113)

StandardToken (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#127-178) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#135-146)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#152-164)

MintableToken.refund (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#303-323) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- mintingFinished == true && goalReached == false && alreadyMintedOnce == true

elements.expression: mintingFinished == true && goalReached == false && alreadyMintedOnce == true

analysis.description:
TitsToken.vote (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-votedYes.add(votes) (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol)
	-votedNo.add(votes) (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol)

MintableToken.maxMintingTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#187)
MintableToken.mintingGoal should be constant (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#187-189)
MintableToken.titsTokenAuthor should be constant (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#189-193)
TitsToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#330)
TitsToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#329)
TitsToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#329-330)
TitsToken.votedNo should be constant (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#333-334)
TitsToken.votedYes should be constant (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#333)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#122) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of BasicToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#107) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of BasicToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#107) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of StandardToken.allowance (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#173-174) is not in mixedCase

Parameter '_to' of StandardToken.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#135) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of StandardToken.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#135) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of StandardToken.approve (/unique_chucks/39/0x03209bde47da583547c17c47e7ca74bfa3dfb404.sol#152) is not in mixedCase
